name: blabbered
content:

past simple and past participle of
blabber
to talk a lot, especially in a way people find annoying or embarrassing: He's always blabbering on about computers. Synonyms
blab informal
chatter
gabble mainly UK
prate old-fashioned
prattle Compare
gibber mainly disapproving
